entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
